name: Sketchy annotations
description:
I find myself often wanting sketch marks and handwriting fonts to help annotate moments during storytelling or to add notes to mock ups. So I drew a few arrows, boxes, circles and the like on procreate and dropped them in here. I also organized some of my favorite handwriting and script fonts in here since I always forget which ones I like.


Shoutouts:

  • Thanks to Dave Williames' Image Tracer Plugin, which helped convert the png imports to vectors
  • Thanks to Remilla Ty's great work on doodles for FigJam which I included a subset of relevant ones here for convenience
  • Thanks to all of the google font script and handwriting creators out there
